trans-unit.source: Base class for all validator components.
trans-unit.target: 所有验证程序组件的基类。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The Validator class is used to ensure that activities are configured properly at design time.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]验证程序类用于确保在设计时正确配置活动。

trans-unit.source: Validators are instantiated during design time when the designer validates the properties assigned to activities; if an activity's parameters are not configured properly, the designer will show smart tag errors for the incorrect values.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时，当设计器验证分配给活动; 的属性中会实例化验证程序如果活动参数配置不正确，设计器将显示不正确的值的智能标记错误。

trans-unit.source: Validators also run during compile time, and will return validation errors if constraints such as object parent or child type, minimum number of children, etc. are not correct.
trans-unit.target: 此外期间运行的验证程序编译时间，并将返回验证错误，如果例如对象父级或子级类型的约束，子级等的最小数量不正确。

trans-unit.source: Validators will also run at runtime when a markup-based workflow is instantiated using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 基于标记的工作流实例化使用时，验证程序也可以运行在运行时<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A>方法。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of a Validator is to ensure that errors are known during design time, and are not exposed as exceptions during runtime.
trans-unit.target: 一个验证程序的主要用途是确保错误已知在设计时和在运行时期间没有公开为异常。

trans-unit.source: Validators are associated with the activities that they validate using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidatorAttribute.ValidatorTypeName%2A> attribute; all activity validators must inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 验证程序是与它们将验证使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidatorAttribute.ValidatorTypeName%2A>特性; 验证程序必须从<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator>类</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator>继承的所有活动</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidatorAttribute.ValidatorTypeName%2A>的活动相关联

trans-unit.source: By default, validators will validate meta properties; they do not validate instance properties which are settable at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，验证程序将验证元属性;它们不会验证实例属性可设置在运行时。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Helper method to extract the full property name.
trans-unit.target: 若要提取完整属性名称的帮助器方法。

trans-unit.source: Useful when the validated property is nested.
trans-unit.target: 如果嵌套的验证的属性非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The method traverses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext> in the stack to build the full name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法遍历<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext>在堆栈上要生成的属性的完整名称。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext>

trans-unit.source: For example: the name My.Actor.Bas is built using three <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext> items.
trans-unit.target: 例如︰ My.Actor.Bas 使用三个生成的名称<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext>项。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext>

trans-unit.source: If the validated property belongs to an object that is an item in a collection, the method will produce the name of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果验证的属性属于一个对象，它在集合中的项，则此方法将生成集合的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"></xref> linked to the validation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"> </xref>与验证链接。

trans-unit.source: The full property name.
trans-unit.target: 完整的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: manager is .
trans-unit.target: manageris .

trans-unit.source: Validates the specified object and returns a collection of validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 验证指定的对象并返回验证错误的集合。

trans-unit.source: The validation manager linked to the validation.
trans-unit.target: 与验证链接的验证管理器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>进行验证。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> that contains the validation errors resulting from this operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含此操作产生的验证错误。

trans-unit.source: obj is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: obj为空引用 ()。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, validates a change based on a specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> being added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时验证基于指定的更改<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>正在添加或移除。

trans-unit.source: This function is called during the application of changes that are made to the workflow during dynamic updates.
trans-unit.target: 在动态更新在对工作流所做的更改应用的过程中调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: In the base implementation, a null reference (Visual Basic `Nothing`) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 在基实现中，空引用 (Visual Basic `Nothing`) 返回。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError"></xref> generated by the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError"> </xref>由操作生成。

trans-unit.source: action is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: action为空引用 ()。

trans-unit.source: Helper method to automatically validate the specific objects properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要自动验证特定对象属性的帮助器方法。

trans-unit.source: The validation manager linked to the validation.
trans-unit.target: 与验证链接的验证管理器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>进行验证。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> that contains the validation errors resulting from this operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含此操作产生的验证错误。

trans-unit.source: obj is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: obj为空引用 ()。

trans-unit.source: Performs validation on a property and returns a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> that contains the results of that validation.
trans-unit.target: 对属性执行验证并返回<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref>包含验证结果。

trans-unit.source: If no errors result from the validation, an empty <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有错误导致的验证，空<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection>返回。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> on the subject property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>有关主题属性。</xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: The owner of the property.
trans-unit.target: 属性的所有者。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"></xref> for this operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"> </xref>对于此操作。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> that contains the results of that validation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"> </xref>包含验证结果。
